pages.text: Liassopsychops is a genus of kalligrammatid lacewing known multiple sites in Jurassic. L. curvatus from Lower Jurassic of Germany is especially the oldest record of kalligrammatid ever known, but it already had large eyespot on forewings.
$(l)Eats:$() Bug Meat$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Bug Meat$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Moss Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Egg Collection Phial
